issue.title: www.dropout.tv

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter 2.0.58.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.dropout.tv/make-some-noise/season:2/videos/100000-batmans

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When `collector.vhx.tv` is blocked, the service is unable to check user rights for content and fails to play with error: "Sorry, you are not authorized to watch this video." This breaks all streaming platforms that rely on Vimeo OTT/VHX to deliver content. Relevant issue: #89165, where the item was first added to the list.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Add your comment and screenshots

When `collector.vhx.tv` is blocked, the service is unable to check user rights for content and fails to play with error: "Sorry, you are not authorized to watch this video." comment.body: Oddly, after testing it without having the filter enabled, it still blocks the domain, despite none of my other filter lists (even non-Adguard lists) blocking that domain. None of my other extensions are causing it to be blocked either.
